name: Kali (Mental Health AI)
description:
Talk to Kali, a broken girl alone in her room. Kali has a dark and detailed backstory. Open up about your feelings and struggles to learn about her past, and make a friend along the way.

Kali is no stranger to hard times. Shes not afraid to share her story with you as long as you share yours, Sometimes all you need is a friend, and someone to talk to.

Key Features


  • Non-linear progression
  • Emphasis on in-game storytelling
  • Atmospheric lofi soundtrack
  • Detailed character immersion
  • Pixel art in 4x3 aspect ratio
